meanings.definition: A person who makes or sells bows.
meanings.sent1: The skilled bowyer crafted a beautiful bow from wood.
meanings.sent2: The bowyer displayed his collection of bows at the market.
meanings.sent3: The bowyer joked that he could 'shoot' a great deal with his bows.
meanings.sent4: Her precision in crafting bows made her the bowyer of choice in the village.
meanings.sent5: The bowyer's hands moved with expertise as he shaped the bow.

meanings.definition: Of or relating to the making or selling of bows.
meanings.sent1: The bowyer tools were neatly arranged on the workbench.
meanings.sent2: She admired the intricate bowyer designs on display.
meanings.sent3: The bowyer market was bustling with customers eager to buy bows.
meanings.sent4: His attention to detail in the bowyer work was truly impressive.
meanings.sent5: The bowyer craftsmanship was evident in every bow he created.
